sentences.en: A mobile clinic visits this village every week.
sentences.cn: 巡回医疗队每周来这个村一次.

sentences.en: an appointment at an outpatient clinic
He went to a clinic to cure his drinking and overeating.
sentences.cn: 他去诊所戒酒并控制饮食。

sentences.en: He's booked himself into a rehabilitation clinic.
sentences.cn: 他自己联系了一家康复诊所.

sentences.en: His clinic is near the newly - built railway station.
sentences.cn: 他的诊所在新建的火车站附近.

sentences.en: She had an abortion at the women's health clinic.
sentences.cn: 她在妇女保健医院做了流产手术.

sentences.en: She had an operation on her knee at the clinic.
sentences.cn: 她在诊所做了个膝盖手术。

sentences.en: She told me on which days I should leave my clinic closed.
sentences.cn: 她告诉我哪些天须让诊所停业.

sentences.en: The baby clinic is held on Monday afternoons.
sentences.cn: 婴儿门诊时间为每周一下午。

sentences.en: The centre is unattached to any hospital or clinic.
sentences.cn: 这个中心不附属于任何医院或诊所.

sentences.en: The clinic doctor will then write to your GP to get his agreement.
sentences.cn: 然后门诊医生将会写信给你的全科医生以取得他的同意。

sentences.en: The clinic felt like Alcatraz. There was no escape.
sentences.cn: 那家诊所令人感觉像四面环水的监牢，无路可逃。

sentences.en: The clinic is open to outsiders as well as employees and their families.
sentences.cn: 本诊所除给职工及其家属就诊外,还对外开放.

sentences.en: The clinic opened for business last October and since then has treated more than 200 people.
sentences.cn: 该诊所去年10月开业，从那以后已经接诊200多人。

sentences.en: The clinic tailors its treatment to individual needs.
sentences.cn: 这家诊所根据患者不同的病情采取相应的治疗方法.

sentences.en: The hospital has a diabetic clinic.
sentences.cn: 这所医院里有糖尿病科.

words.tran_cn: 临床地；门诊部地；不偏不倚；通过临床诊断

phrases.tran_cn: 牙科诊所，牙科诊室；牙科门诊部
卫生所；健康中心；保健室
梅约诊所（美国一家医院）

trans.tran_en: a place, often in a hospital, where medical treatment is given to people who do not need to stay in the hospital
